hasAttributes.name: acquisitionDetails
hasAttributes.description: Details of acquisition of the asset, e.g. acquirer, asset type, asset class, etc.

hasAttributes.name: additionType
hasAttributes.description: Category or type of asset, e.g. Plant and Machinery, PPE or similar.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedByDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: assetCategoryId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the asset category.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the addition was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetAdditionDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on which the addition was included on the system.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetAdditionId
hasAttributes.description: ID of the addition record relating to this asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetCost
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency the cost at which the fixed asset was acquired from the vendor or built.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUniqueId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for the fixed asset. May need to be created by combining multiple fields e.g. BusinessUnitCode, fixedAssetId.

hasAttributes.name: glAccount
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for the GL account code associated with the asset. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetail, trialBalance and chartOfAccounts

hasAttributes.name: glTransactionId
hasAttributes.description: Transaction ID in the GL for the transaction recognising asset addition.

hasAttributes.name: inUseFlag
hasAttributes.description: Indicator used to determine whether the asset is in use.

hasAttributes.name: intangibleAssetFlag
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the asset is an intangible asset.

hasAttributes.name: inventorial
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the asset should be included in physical inventory.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedByDate
hasAttributes.description: The modifying date for the last person modifying the fixed asset addition entry.

hasAttributes.name: leaseId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the capital or operating lease.

hasAttributes.name: leaseIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether asset is owned or leased.

hasAttributes.name: lotNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

hasAttributes.name: modelNumber
hasAttributes.description: Model number assigned to the asset by the manufacturer.

hasAttributes.name: newUsed
hasAttributes.description: Option indicating whether asset is new or used.

hasAttributes.name: parentAssetId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the parent asset for the child or component asset.

hasAttributes.name: placedInService
hasAttributes.description: Point in time when the asset is first placed in use for the purpose of accounting, primarily to calculate depreciation or grant a tax credit.

hasAttributes.name: propertyTypeCode
hasAttributes.description: Option indicating whether the asset is considered personal, real, or residential property.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the purchase order, regardless of the date the order is entered. If no purchase order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderId
hasAttributes.description: Purchase order ID associated with the purchase of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: purchaseOrderRaisedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of raising the purchase order for the fixed asset acquisition.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: serialNumber
hasAttributes.description: Serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier from whom the asset was purchased and to whom payment is due. Must match the supplierId in supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: supplierName
hasAttributes.description: Name of the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: tagNumber
hasAttributes.description: Unique user-defined tracking number for an asset.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: vatCode
hasAttributes.description: Code confirming which VAT category the asset falls into.

hasAttributes.name: warrantyId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the warranty defined for the asset.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedByDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: bonusRate
hasAttributes.description: Bonus rate used to calculate bonus depreciation.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: capitalAdjustment
hasAttributes.description: Value of capital adjustment after considering impairment transaction.

hasAttributes.name: depreciationEffectiveDate
hasAttributes.description: The date upon which fixed asset depreciation will take into effect.

hasAttributes.name: depreciationForPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Depreciation on the fixed asset for the relevant period to be charged in the books.

hasAttributes.name: depreciationRate
hasAttributes.description: Rate at which depreciation will be charged on the carrying amount of fixed assets.

hasAttributes.name: depreciationReserve
hasAttributes.description: Total depreciation expense including the bonus depreciation recognized for the asset.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the order was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciableBasis
hasAttributes.description: Value of the asset against which depreciation is calculated.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationAmount
hasAttributes.description: Depreciation amount charged to the profit and loss account depending on the method of depreciation.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with depreciation charged on the asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationMethod
hasAttributes.description: Method used for calculation depreciation, e.g. reducing balance, straight line.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetFairValue
hasAttributes.description: Estimated amount of the fair value of the asset on the open market, used for valuation.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetReplacementCost
hasAttributes.description: Estimated cost to replace fixed asset, used for valuation purposes.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetSalvageValue
hasAttributes.description: Estimated amount of consideration the entity would expect to receive on scrapping the asset for salvage at the end of its useful life.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUsefulLife
hasAttributes.description: The period/time an asset is expected to be functional and fit-for-use.

hasAttributes.name: generalFund
hasAttributes.description: Value of general fund after considering impairment effect.

hasAttributes.name: glAccount
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of GL Account on which depreciation on value asset has been posted. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetail, trialBalance and chartOfAccounts

hasAttributes.name: glTransactionId
hasAttributes.description: Transaction ID in the GL for recognising depreciation on an asset.

hasAttributes.name: impairmentAmount
hasAttributes.description: Impairment loss amount of the asset.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedByDate
hasAttributes.description: The modifying date of the last person modifying the fixed asset depreciation entry.

hasAttributes.name: lotNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

hasAttributes.name: ltdProduction
hasAttributes.description: Life-to-date production for a units of production asset.

hasAttributes.name: revalAmortisation
hasAttributes.description: Amount of revaluation reserve amortised during the current period.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: serialNumber
hasAttributes.description: Serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification.

hasAttributes.name: uniqueId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with depreciation made to the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: ytdImpairment
hasAttributes.description: Year-to-date impairment amount.

hasAttributes.name: assetToBeAbandonedDisposedOfOtherThanByForSaleDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on which the asset is to be abandoned or disposed of other than by for sale.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: currencyId
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: depreciationRate
hasAttributes.description: Rate at which depreciation will be charged on the carrying amount of fixed assets.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetAccumulatedDepreciation
hasAttributes.description: Value of depreciation to date on the asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetAccumulatedDepreciationAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which accumulated depreciation or depreciation is posted in the GL.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetAcquisitionDate
hasAttributes.description: The date when the fixed asset was acquired.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetAssetAccount
hasAttributes.description: Asset account to which this asset is consigned, may be used to categorise assets or associate them with specific cost or project centres or geographic locations.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetAvailableForSaleDate
hasAttributes.description: The date at which the asset is classified as available for sale.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetBarcode
hasAttributes.description: Universal Product Code or other general identifier.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetCIPAccount
hasAttributes.description: Construction in Progress account to which the asset is allocated.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetCIPFlag
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify fixed assets which are Construction in Progress (CIP).

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetClass
hasAttributes.description: Class of fixed assets to which the asset is assigned, e.g. equipment, vehicles, land, etc.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetCode
hasAttributes.description: Code used to identify the fixed asset type.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciableBasis
hasAttributes.description: Value of the asset against which depreciation is calculated.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDepreciationAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which depreciation is charged for this fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetDisposalDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on which the asset is sold or discarded.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetFairValue
hasAttributes.description: Estimated amount of the fair value of the asset on the open market, used for valuation.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetGroup01
hasAttributes.description: Internal group to which the fixed asset is assigned.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetGroup02
hasAttributes.description: Internal group to which the fixed asset is assigned.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetInServiceDate
hasAttributes.description: Identify the service date when the asset was first placed.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetInactiveFlag
hasAttributes.description: Flag to identify assets as inactive or not in use.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetNetBookValue
hasAttributes.description: The value of fixed assets after deducting the accumulated depreciation and accumulated impairment expenses from the original cost of fixed assets.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetOriginalCost
hasAttributes.description: Purchased cost of the asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetQuantityOnHand
hasAttributes.description: The fixed asset quantity that are available for use.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRealisedGainLossAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which realised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetReplacementCost
hasAttributes.description: Estimated cost to replace fixed asset, used for valuation purposes.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRetirementDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of fixed asset retirement.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetSalvageValue
hasAttributes.description: Estimated amount of consideration the entity would expect to receive on scrapping the asset for salvage at the end of its useful life.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetType
hasAttributes.description: Identify the type of fixed asset, e.g. buildings, computer equipment, software, furniture, land, machinery, and vehicles.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which unrealised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUsefulLife
hasAttributes.description: The period/time an asset is expected to be functional and fit-for-use.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUsefulLifeRemaining
hasAttributes.description: The period/time an asset is expected to be functional and fit-for-use from the current date.

hasAttributes.name: locationCode
hasAttributes.description: A code used for identifying the location of fixed assets.

hasAttributes.name: locationDescription
hasAttributes.description: Text description of the location where the fixed asset can be found.

hasAttributes.name: locationId
hasAttributes.description: ID of the location of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: lotNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

hasAttributes.name: manufacturerId
hasAttributes.description: Fixed asset manufacturer ID.

hasAttributes.name: projectId
hasAttributes.description: Project ID to which the fixed asset relates to.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: serialNumber
hasAttributes.description: Serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier from whom the asset was purchased and to whom payment is due. Must match the supplierId in supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: supplierName
hasAttributes.description: Name of the supplier.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: acquirerId
hasAttributes.description: ID of the acquirer of the fixed asset on disposal.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedByDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: costRetired
hasAttributes.description: Amount of cost retired from the asset.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on which the fixed asset removal was entered onto the system. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRealizedGainLossAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which realised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRealizedGainLossAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of realised gain or loss on the fixed asset disposal.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalCashProceedsAmount
hasAttributes.description: Cash proceeds received on removal of the fixed assets.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalDate
hasAttributes.description: The date when the fixed asset is removed for sale or discarding.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalNonCashProceedsAmount
hasAttributes.description: Fixed asset removal proceeds value other than cash proceeds which can include exchange with other fixed assets, debt securities or other rights to payment.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetRemovalsId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with removals of the asset.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAccount
hasAttributes.description: Account to which unrealised gains or losses on assets is posted in the GL.

hasAttributes.name: fixedAssetUnrealizedGainLossAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of change in value of asset not yet realised.

hasAttributes.name: glAccount
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of GL Account on which removal transaction is posted. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetail, trialBalance and chartOfAccounts

hasAttributes.name: glTransactionId
hasAttributes.description: Transaction ID in the GL for the transaction recognising asset removals.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedByDate
hasAttributes.description: The modifying date of the last person modifying the fixed asset removal entry.

hasAttributes.name: lotNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identification number assigned to a particular quantity or lot of material or depending on the asset classified.

hasAttributes.name: reductionRate
hasAttributes.description: Depreciation reduction percentage for the group and its member assets.

hasAttributes.name: removalType
hasAttributes.description: Type of fixed asset removal.

hasAttributes.name: saleAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount received from the sale of an asset.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: serialNumber
hasAttributes.description: Serial number for asset, used by manufacturer for identification.

hasAttributes.name: soldTo
hasAttributes.description: Name of the party to whom the asset was sold as part of retirement.

hasAttributes.name: taxCode
hasAttributes.description: Code used to identify taxes relevant to the transaction.

hasAttributes.name: terminalGainLoss
hasAttributes.description: Option indicating how terminal gain or loss should be recognized for member asset retirement.

hasAttributes.name: tradeInAssetId
hasAttributes.description: Asset identification number of the new asset for which the retired asset was traded in.

hasAttributes.name: transactionFees
hasAttributes.description: The transaction fees to be incurred for the fixed asset removal.

hasAttributes.name: uniqueId
hasAttributes.description: ID associated with removals made to the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.
